Nameless Spirit:
I've got just the guy for the job! *He'll open them for you.* Some of the boxes will be empty, but you'll get lucky eventually! You can keep everything you find!
*My friend collects relics of the Empire. Bring him some and he'll give you something nice!* Oh! I almost forgot! There are hidden traps set at the enterances to this sepulcher to discourage trespassers...
